thorwin.math

Interface QR

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface QR
extends java.io.Serializable
    QR decomposition.
    See Also:
    Wikipedia on the QR decomposition

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Matrix getH() 
      Matrix getQ() 
      Matrix getR() 
      boolean isFullRank()
      Calculates if the matrix is full-rank.
      java.util.Optional<Matrix> solve(Matrix matrix)
      Solves the least squares solution of A×X = B.

    • Method Detail

      • getH

        Matrix getH()
        Returns:
        The lower trapezoidal matrix whose getColumnDimension define the reflections

      • getR

        Matrix getR()
        Returns:
        The upper triangular factor

      • getQ

        Matrix getQ()
        Returns:
        Return the (economy-sized) orthogonal factor

      • solve

        java.util.Optional<Matrix> solve(Matrix matrix)
        Solves the least squares solution of A×X = B.
        Parameters:
        matrix - m with as many rows as A and any number of columns.
        Returns:
        X that minimizes the two norm of Q×R×X-B.

      • isFullRank

        boolean isFullRank()
        Calculates if the matrix is full-rank.
        Returns:
        true if R, and hence A, has full rank.
